sections.body:
##### Our mission

We have set ourselves a unique and meaningful challenge: for every act of hatred against Israel and its people, we will plant trees in the Negev Desert.

A symbol of life that will flourish in the midst of a desert, reminding us that even in the most arid places, love can sprout. All of this, thanks to the collaboration of the Israeli organization Keren Kayemet LeIsrael.

hero.title: Help us transform hatred into love
hero.text: If you have witnessed an act of hatred towards Israel and the Jewish people on the street or online, report it using #HATE4LOVE and turn hatred into an act of love towards nature.
